items.title: Cava’s CFO on sustaining growth and developing future leaders amid consumer strain
items.description: The company is keeping prices steady while investing in people, says Tricia Tolivar.

items.title: Trump pardons Giuliani, Mark Meadows, others involved in effort to block 2020 election result, DOJ official says
items.description: The proclamation, posted online late Sunday, explicitly says the pardon does not apply to Trump.

items.title: Does international experience still matter for future CEOs?
items.description: Once a ticket to the top, global stints are being redefined in an era of AI, protectionism, and regional markets.

items.title: DeFi is creeping into corporate cash flow—‘The cat’s out of the bag’
items.description: More firms are thinking about parking spare cash in DeFi vaults that offer better yield and easier withdrawals.
